tasks.label: IEx
tasks.command: docker compose exec elixir iex -S mix

tasks.label: Test
tasks.command: docker compose exec elixir mix test

tasks.label: Test watch
tasks.command: docker compose exec elixir mix test.watch

tasks.label: Install dependencies
tasks.command: docker compose exec elixir mix do local.hex --force, local.rebar --force, deps.get

tasks.label: Update dependencies
tasks.command: docker compose exec elixir mix deps.update --all

tasks.label: Test file
tasks.command: docker compose exec elixir mix test ${relativeFile}

tasks.label: Test line
tasks.command: docker compose exec elixir mix test ${relativeFile}:${lineNumber}

tasks.label: Reset DB
tasks.command: docker compose exec -e MIX_ENV=test elixir mix do ecto.drop, ecto.create, ecto.migrate && docker compose exec elixir mix do ecto.drop, ecto.create, ecto.migrate
